about_the_game:
Inspired by mental health and education, The Loneliest Artist Revamp hopes to provide a fun learning experience on combating loneliness, stress, and coping with change.

Guide Charlie on an emotional journey through interactive puzzles, as she deals with the stubborn embodiment of her anxiety.

Explore multiple locations and scenes while details of her relationship with her brother emerge as he prepares to leave for the Army. Discover the true source of her worry as she learns to cope with sudden new changes.

Key Features:
⦁ Enjoy the unique art style displayed through fully designed paintings, portraits and items.
• Fully customized 3D Character Models with alternate poses in gameplay.
⦁ Become fully immersed in the compelling character dynamics through relatable experiences and dialogue.
⦁ Discover new locations and a variety of objects to interact with and learn additional details from.
⦁ Complete puzzles to earn access to new scenes, assisting with character development and progression.
• Unique UI elements and Menu Screens.

short_description: The Loneliest Artist Revamp will take you on a journey with Charlie as she struggles to control her anxiety due to new changes in her life. Play through special puzzles and mini games to help Charlie accept the change happening around her.
